data insulin;
input id group y1 y2 y3 y4 y5 y6 y7;
datalines;
1 1 78.1 68.3 77.5 76.4 70.7 69.8 57.8
2 1 124.2 97.1 85.2 66.6 66.3 62.2 59.9
3 1 106.2 108.7 94.7 78.4 88.1 85.9 66.9
4 1 92.5 82.9 90 87.8 75.3 73.7 69.4
5 1 116.2 110.2 95.1 81.3 58.8 52.5 49.1
6 1 104.8 85 81.1 80 73.6 62.6 59.9
7 1 107.5 111 80.7 87.9 71.4 56.6 61.5
8 1 118.5 97 78 64 62.3 73.9 76.6
9 1 79.8 82.6 75.5 65.8 67.9 60 65.1
10 1 95.7 91.7 69.1 69.2 72.3 83.7 80.9
11 1 88 80.9 70.5 75.7 63.8 58.3 57.1
12 1 97.9 83.5 100.1 76.1 52 50.6 69.1
13 2 103 78.1 69.8 61.4 70.9 56.9 63.5
14 2 82.2 74.9 80.3 61.5 57.3 47.9 65.3
15 2 116.2 78.1 84.8 67 61 45.7 45
16 2 107.4 88 69.7 65.8 47.5 43.3 28.6
17 2 83.5 95.2 83.7 77 58.2 59.4 43.7
18 2 104.1 75 62 66.6 62 51.4 35
19 2 114.9 99.3 83.1 68.8 63.7 52.2 36.8
20 2 117 81.2 84.1 58.7 53.6 72.1 53.8
21 2 95.7 68.5 59.7 71.8 53.5 52.2 60.5
22 2 100.3 85.2 74.1 70.4 65.1 44.3 54
23 2 98.4 89.5 70.7 71.8 51.7 41.2 42.5
24 2 103.1 94.1 90.3 62.3 53.6 51.2 57.9

27 3 115.1 95 88.2 77.9 74.4 58.8 56.9

29 3 101.1 96.4 85.1 78.6 59.3 62.9 42.2
30 3 108.9 88.7 76.3 66.9 44.6 71.4 50.2
31 3 114.4 90 85.2 82.8 73.2 62.5 43.3
32 3 103.5 86.9 70.8 79 74.7 50.2 40.1
33 3 99.7 82.3 71.6 83.5 71.9 52.5 49.7
34 3 95 92.8 70.7 74.6 57.9 59.2 35.9
35 3 113.3 95.4 85.6 51.4 57.8 50.1 61
36 3 85.6 96.9 99.5 77.9 46.9 45.5 51.5
;

data insulin2;
set insulin;
  time=0;
  blood_sug=y1;
  output;
  time=0.5;
  blood_sug=y2;
  output;
  time=1;
  blood_sug=y3;
  output;
  time=1.5;
  blood_sug=y4;
  output;
  time=2;
  blood_sug=y5;
  output;
  time=2.5;
  blood_sug=y6;
  output;
  time=3;
  blood_sug=y7;
  output;
  drop y1-y7;
run;
